casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jermel Toron KRIDER 68A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 4, 2018 Emily H. Davis, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Krider, Jermel Toron.

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

Allison A. Angell, Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney Generals, Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 1st of June 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of June 2018."
